400BadRequest.description: The request cannot be fulfilled due to bad syntax.

403Forbidden.description: The server understood the request, but is refusing to fulfill it. Authorization will not help and the request SHOULD NOT be repeated.

WWW-Authenticate.description: Information on how to authorize correctly.

500InternalServerError.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition which prevented it from fulfilling the request.
